LanguageData.Leliel_Cotton_Cotton.label: Lelilel cotton
LanguageData.Leliel_Cotton_Cotton.description: Plant lelilel cotton that grows in dark places.
LanguageData.Research_Moonlight_table.label: Moonlight bench
LanguageData.Research_Moonlight_table.description: You can make various weapons using the moonlight workbench.
LanguageData.Moonlight_weapon.label: Moonlight weapons
LanguageData.Moonlight_weapon.description: You can create weapons called moonlight weapon.
LanguageData.nano_Fabrication.label: Nanomachine workbench
LanguageData.nano_Fabrication.description: It is a kind of workbench for crafting equipment and weapons through nanomachines.
LanguageData.erg_rifle.label: Electrothermal rail weapons
LanguageData.erg_rifle.description: Make an electrothermal chemical cannon converted as a portable that accelerates and fires bullets with chemical fuel with other Electrothermal rail weapons.
LanguageData.Nova_knight.label: Nova knight power armor
LanguageData.Nova_knight.description: It is a power armor with a medieval appearance.
